welcome:
Welcome to Twenty-One. This is a simplified version of the popular game Blackjack.
This is a version without splits, double-downs, and other complex plays.
Please refer to https://www.blackjack.org/blackjack-rules/ for rules of the original game.
test: You start with %d chips. The game ends when you accumulate %d chips or go broke trying.
playAgain: Would you like to play again? Enter (y)es or (n)o:
invalidPlayAgain: That is an invalid input. Please try again (y)es or (n)o:
invalidAction: Please enter a valid action (h)it or (s)tay:
isBroke: You are broke. There's always a tomorrow!
isChampion: You beat the house. Great job!
